rows.label: qst701002_msg0001
rows.name:
To build a shelter, more than
anything, we need the cooperation
of a skilled carpenter.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0002
rows.name:
One of the best craftsmen in this shopping
ward, a guy named Zain, is in the Fabri
Industry Ward. But he's a bit difficult.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear he's close with Morumo,
so I don't think he'll turn you
away at the door, but...

rows.label: qst701002_msg0101
rows.name:
I see... as I thought, it's
not going to be easy.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0102
rows.name:
He's got that old-fashioned craftsman
spirit, or rather, Zain-san can be
stubborn. Usually, Rita steps in, but...

rows.label: qst701002_msg0103
rows.name:
...Come to think of it, he said it
before. That he can't abandon his
child, so he can't leave the capital.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0104
rows.name:
Could it be that he's on
edge because he's worried
about his only daughter?

rows.label: qst701002_msg0105
rows.name:
Sorry, but if you see Rita anywhere,
please tell her to come back for once.
She should still be somewhere in Gula.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0106
rows.name:
How do I know? Because I'm the one who
recommended she go to Gula. You know, "spare
the rod, spoil the child" and all that.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0201
rows.name:
As for Rita's exact whereabouts...
With their skills, I think they're
still wandering around Gula.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0202
rows.name:
That's it! How about you try asking
around at the port in Gula?

rows.label: qst701002_msg0203
rows.name:
They're a lively pair, so it's
possible that someone remembers them.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0301
rows.name:
You're gathering materials for the
shelter, right? Take this with you.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0302
rows.name:
Sorry, that's about all I have that's
useful right now. It's a last-minute
contribution from my tight household budget.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0401
rows.name:
Zain's skills are certain. If the shelter
is completed safely, the residents' anxiety
can be relieved for the time being.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0402
rows.name:
I know it's tough, but please
lend us your strength for
just a little longer.
